name: Ultima Percutiens
description:
A small 2D Top-Down Horror game, made in a team of 3. In this game you have to fight against several bosses and have to complete different objectives to progress. It's the first project I made in a team

Controls: Keyboard & Mouse

Language: German

Team:

  • Collin K. - Programming
  • Monika G. - Art & Animations
    • Twitter: @MokaMokaArt
  • Leo L. - Game Design & Art
